text: @realDonaldTrump Liar! COVID-19 is hurting many businesses. Fox News and you are“fake news,” and you are bad for America. America needs a sensible, caring adult as president—not a spiteful, jealous, money grubber, name-calling child like you! You screwed up your job to protect Americans!
